job_description: Design Quality Engineer - job post Amerit Consulting Inc. San Diego, CA • Hybrid remote $50 - $54 an hour -  Temporary, Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary $50 - $54 an hour Job Type Temporary Contract Position: Design Quality Engineer Location: San Diego CA 92121 Duration: 9 Months extendable Pay Rate: $50/hr - $54/hr (depending on experience) Relocation Expenses/ Assistance: NO SUMMARY: Design Quality Engineer II is accountable for supporting Product Design Changes and Product maintenance through the application of Quality engineering skills for medical devices. This person will play an active role in the processes to ensure products meet quality standards consistent with both Corporate and Business Unit policies while meeting all design control and other regulatory requirements. Responsibilities Provides support for application of technical principles, theories, concepts and quality, tools and systems. Support the Development of technical solutions to complex problems which require the regular use of technical knowledge. Is a team member for design control / process control projects. Can serve as a CAPA resource. Modifies methodologies and procedures, ensuring continuous improvement of desired outcomes. Supports quality system audits. Provides input to the management review process as required Design Control EU MDD/MDR Change control Risk Management Process Validation Identification of CTQ's Handling of deviations and non-conformances Test method validations Supplier qualification Post Market Surveillance CAPA - Root cause investigation and implementation of corrective / preventive actions Proper Use of Statistics (Sampling Plans) Liaise with Manufacturing Plants Provide functional support to cross-functional teams Support Internal and external audit Pursue courses of action necessary to obtain desired results. Plans and participates in disciplines strategically relevant to the business and/or functions Participates in multi-disciplinary projects Job Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree A minimum of 3 years of relevant experience or a combination of equivalent education and relevant experience Minimum 2 years of experience supporting a quality management system for medical devices with some knowledge of applicable regulatory, Corporate and/or Unit requirements. Knowledge on applicable Regulatory and Industry standards (21-CFR-820, ISO 13485, MDD, MDR, ISO 14971, ISO 10993, etc.) Quality Engineering tools, Statistics, Problem Solving, strong Interpersonal Skills, Leadership, all forms of Communication ASQ Certificate(s) desirable (but not required) Design for Six Sigma preferred Job Types: Contract, Temporary Pay: $50.00 - $54.00 per hour Benefits: Health insurance Experience level: 2 years Schedule: 8 hour shift Day shift Monday to Friday Work setting: Hybrid remote Ability to commute/relocate: San Diego, CA: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Education: Bachelor's (Required) Experience: Design Control: 2 years (Required) Risk management: 2 years (Required) Work Location: In person Health insurance If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
